price: Maka apakah mereka tidak memperhatikan perkataan (Kami) atau apakah telah datang kepada mereka apa yang tidak pernah datang kepada nenek moyang mereka dahulu?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
